properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhu raajyam nishchala mainadi Shubha pradambu shaashwata mainadi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prudhivi nandu unna vanniyu Kadali gatinchi povu chunnavi Gatinchadu nee vaakya meppudu Khyaati gaanu niluchu neppudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Janaangamulu kadulu chunnavi Jagamandellanu shaantiye ledu Prabhuni prajalu stirulai yunduru Prabhuni prajalu nitya mundedaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bhoomi aakaashamulu kadilimpa badunu Antarinchi tharali povun Prabhuni gruhamu kadala dennadu Ribhuni illu nityamu niluchun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Udayinchunuga raajya mokati Podi cheyunuga annya raajyamulan Aa raajyam antarinchadu Aa raajyam nityamu niluchun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thana prajalaku raajyanu nosagan Ghanu dagu thandri korik a idiye Prabhu prema chalincha neradu Prabhu prema niluchu niratam{/lang-eng}
